summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a senior meeting at JPMorgan Chase. Staley mentions a meeting with a Chinese minister and plans to meet with a prince later that day. The email emphasizes confidentiality and contains disclaimers regarding the information shared.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email and discusses confidential matters.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email and shares details about a significant meeting at JPMorgan.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating in a personal and professional context regarding meetings and offers.

events.title: Meeting with Chinese Minister
events.description: Jes Staley had a senior meeting with Minister Li Yuanchao of the Organization Department.

events.title: Planned Meeting with Prince
events.description: Jes Staley mentions plans to meet with a prince later in the day.

keyFacts: The email is dated September 2, 2010, and discusses a meeting at JPMorgan Chase.
Jes Staley mentions a significant meeting with a Chinese minister.
Staley plans to meet with a prince later that day.
The email emphasizes confidentiality and contains legal disclaimers.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
